PhyloPhlAn
==========

# Available modules


The overview below shows which PhyloPhlAn installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using PhyloPhlAn, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load PhyloPhlAn/3.0.3-foss-2022a
```
